wikitext.*:
'''Sorcha Cusack''' ([[9 April|April 9]], [[1949]]) is an Irish actress, the younger sister of [[wikipedia:Sinéad Cusack|Sinéad Cusack]]. She played [[Goldberry]] in the two episodes of "The Adventures of Tom Bombadil", that were aired as part of [[Tales from the Perilous Realm (1992 radio series)|''Tales from the Perilous Realm'' (1992 radio series)]].
